runs.comm: he gets this one to jag back into the right hander and smacks the pads..only that this was swinging down the leg side.
this one is angled across the right hander, who sticks his bat out and guides this down to third man
gets some inwards swing after pitching on off stump line, the batsman covers the line,  comes forward and defends it to off
he stands tall and slashes this shortish delivery over point, but he doesn't get much timing on this. The third man fielder comes around and does the clean up
he goes full outside off this time, the batsman slices it past point down to that fielder at third man again
back of length this time, it's tight around off stump and rises up a bit. The batsman does well to get behind it and defend it to point
bowls this one from wide of the crease, the batsman looks to clip it to the leg side, but this skids off the thigh pad down to fine leg
back of length outside off, 142 kph, some away movement too, the batsman stays back and defends it to off
this one keeps coming in with the angle from wide of the crease, the batsman defends it to midwicket

a good sharp short ball aimed at the right shoulder! The batsman is not able to get totally behind it and it flies of the shoulder of the bat down to third man. That could have gone anywhere, the batsman is a touch lucky
on a length around off stump, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
wonderful strike! The bowler marginally pitches this up and Pun doesn't need a second invitation, he slices it over point for the team's first boundary
he tries to drive it through cover, but doesn't take his feet forward, therefore doesn't get the punch behind that. The cover fielder slides and makes the stop
another single to third man as the batsman steers this length delivery down to him
he is keeping it tight around off, the batsman defends it to cover point off the back foot
he stays in the crease and punches the length delivery to cover point. Still no runs coming. Shapoor is doing well keeping it tight around off stump
this one takes a thick outside edge as Pun looks to defend this short of length delivery, it runs down to third man for a single

whoa!! Fielding hasn't been Afghanistan's problem but this has to go down as a drop even though no one got near it! Khakurel cleared his front leg out and wanted to cream this over cover, but got no timing and gently lobbed it towards wide mid-off. The two fielders converging from either side were busy looking at each other..
gives himself some room and punches this to wide mid-off for a single
a loud appeal for lbw as Pun gets hit on the pads, but this was going high, going down the leg side, and there was an inside edge too
shortish delivery on the pads, the batsman looks to pull, but the ball hurries on to him and he ends up dabbing it towards square leg
a good delivery this one! Comes in and cramps the batsman for room. He ends up chopping it towards the keeper, but the non-striker for alert and called for a quick single
he has overstepped! He did this in the last match too. The batsman's firm drive to mid-off had nothing to do with the call I suspect
now they take a catch at extra cover but it's not going to bring any cheer. The batsman looked to slap it over cover, but this short ball got big on him and he ended up top edging to the off side

the extra ball has done the damage! Pun, when he made contact with the ball, looked like he had got the timing to take it over mid-off, but no. Nabi takes a simple head high catch there and Nepal, apart from being slow today, have lost a wicket too
back of length delivery on off, the batsman stays in the crease and defends to cover
stays a touch low and the batsman is surprised as he gets an inside edge on that to the leg side
too quick for the batsman! He looks to whip this to the leg side but gets hurried by it and ends up pushing it down the pitch
moves to the leg side to create room but gets beaten as this short of length delivery flies past the outside edge. That was delivery at 138 kph but looked faster than that
he breaks the sequence of dots with a cross-batted mow. Not entirely in control of that but he manages to whack this over midwicket for a boundary
this one is gorgeous! He clears his front leg out of the way and crunches this length delivery straight down the ground. Who's moving? Nobody.
beautifully driven through extra cover! The infield is crowded but Malla takes advantage of a full and flighted delivery by driving it expertly through the gap
this is a poor shot! He looks to hoick the flatter delivery agains the spin and gets completly beaten
creates room and punches this to extra cover..Too many fielders there now after that first boundary. Five in all
wow! He is keen to find that extra cover boundary. This one is over the field, only just though. But this is well hit, as he went along with the spin
forces the bowler to shorten his length, then whacks it over mid-on with a horizontal bat. Good thinking there by Malla
this is massive! It hits the boundary boards over long-on! What an over for Nepal! Malla somehow was expecting this to be tossed up. He just stretches out and thwacks it over long-on
gentle length delivery on off, the batsman defends it to the leg side
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to long on for an easy single
fuller delivery on off, the batsman looks to punch it through the leg side, but gets squared up a touch and ends up pushing it to mid-off
length delivery, Malla pushes it to cover
he looks for a yorker and bowls a low full toss that is punched back to the bowler. The batsman misses out
great work by the fielder at deep extra cover! That was driven with a lot of timing and looked set to reach the boundary, but Shafiqullah times his dive to perfection and saves a run
tossed up from over the wicket, but this is on the pads and the batsman nudges it to midwicket for a single that brings up the team's fifty
works it away off his pads to square leg
on the middle and leg stump line again, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler

a soft dismissal this one! Malla, who looked so good in the first over, surrenders with an unnecessarily risky shot. Nabi kept it around the middle and leg line but Malla tries to drag it to the off side with a reverse-sweep only to get a thick top edge that lobs up gently for the fielder at short third man. That was in fact a switch-hit.
pushed through on the pads, the batsman pushes it to midwicket
flatter and shorter on off, the batsman stays in the crease and punches it to mid on
length delivery on off, the batsman stays solidly behind it and defends it down the pitch
he stands upright and punches this length delivery back to the bowler again
leans into this fuller delivery to drive it through cover, but doesn't get much timing behind that
he looks to punch this through leg side, but gets an inside edge towards midwicket and calls for a quick single
length delivery on off, the batsman punches it to cover for a single

the captain has to go! After solidly getting behind the last few deliveries, he attempts to go across the line to a straight length ball and pays the price. He gets a thick inside edge that flattens the stumps. Joy for Mirwais, who is playing his first match in the tournament. No inside edge actually, he just missed it completely to lose his off stick
floated up on the pads, the batsman pushes it to midwicket
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends
comes forward to defend, but gets an inside edge on to his pads
sweeps this one straight to short fine leg
on the middle stump line, the batsman comes forward and defends
he punches this in the air to the left of the bowler, lands safely for him, but he was not in control of that at all
he floats is up wide outside off to tempt the batsman who lets it go through to the keeper
a loose shot outside off! The batsman looks to punch this back of length delivery through off without getting behind the line, it flies past the outside edge
a touch on the pads, and the batsman looks to clip it fine on the leg side, but that hits his thigh pad and rolls towards short fine leg
this one comes in a touch after pitching. The batsman gets an inside edge on to his pads and comes through for a single
another loose shot by the batsman! He makes no effort to cover the line and tries to slash that back of length delivery to be beaten
comes forward and dabs this length delivery to midwicket for a quick single
short and wide delivery first up from Karim, that is whacked through backward point and Dawlat, running in from deep point, sticks his boot out to keep that in
quicker delivery on off stump, punched back to the bowler off the back foot
steps out of the crease and punches this quicker delivery to extra cover
tossed up for the first time and Vesawkar goes over the top, lifting it over the umpire's head for a boundary. Not much timing behind that, but it was hit very straight
comes down the pitch and chips this one over to long off for a singel
quicker delivery that stays a touch low, the batsman dabs it towards midwicket
tossed up on the pads, the batsman flicks it to deep square leg for a single. And Shenwari, after giving away 18 in his first, oversteps.. As a spinner, as they say, this is a crime.
it's full and it's quick, that's a good ball and the batsman can only dig it out to square leg for a single
flatter and quicker on the stumps, the batsman punches it down to long off for a single
he premeditatedly goes down on his knee to paddle it fine, but gets a top edge down to short fine leg for a sinle
moves away to the leg side to create room and squeezes the flatter delivery to deep point
shorter, but quicker too, the batsman punches it straight to extra cover
more of a seam-up delivery this one! It's quicker too. The batsman looks to clip it to the leg side, but hits it straight to short fine leg
he goes round the wicket and fires it full on off stump, the batsman digs it out to cover for a single
down the leg side this one and it's called a wide
not the right line, another one fired down the leg side
bowls it full outside off, the batsman pushes it to cover
looks to paddle this too early, but only manages to get a faint tickle to short fine leg
this is full and in the zone of hitting. Khakurel has spent enough time to take advantage, he hammers it back over the bowler's head
good follow-up delivery, it's quick and straight, the batsman defends it down the pitch
he drags this from off stump down to long on for a single
tossed up and it's almost a yorker, the batsman digs it out back to Shenwari
flatter outside off, there is no turn so the batsman manages to chip it over extra cover for a couple of runs
high full toss outside off, the batsman misses out on some free runs as he gets a thick outside edge to short third man.. He was looking to hit it through cover
again, tries to hard to whack it down the ground, but only hits it straight to long on
finally one ends up over the boundary! He moves across to the off side and gets a short ball to boot. He whacks it really hard over the short fine leg fielder and that goes all the way
this one is fortunate! He gets a thick outside edge that just evades the diving gully fielder and runs down the boundary
quicker delivery outside off, it should have been hit. But this one is outside the wide marker. Nepal wouldn't mind
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
another outside edge! Another boundary as Hamza puts in the dive too early at third man and sees the ball roll over.. He could have stopped that as the ball was slowing down..
this one is from the middle of the bat and punched to long on, but a sloppy bit of fielding there allows the batsman to come back for a second.. he just ran over the ball
comes down the pitch and smashes it back to the bowler, who does well to stop that
now there is some power on that! It was full on off, Vesawkar goes deep in the crease and smashes it through the left of the bowler for another boundary. Long-off had not chance to stop that
moves to the leg side and drives this full delivery past extra cover for a couple of runs
more runs! Keep them coming.. This is a length delivery that the batsman just carts over the midwicket fielder! No spin, but even if there was, he was going with it.. Super shot
he makes room and slices the short of length delivery over point for another couple of runs

the mid-off fielder is up and Nepal take advantage! This was a slightly slower ball but the batsman spotted that and lifts it over the infield. It just beats the mid-off fielder but this outfield is quick enough to take it to the boundary
another slower delivery, this time the batsman squeezes it down to third man
this one is a good slower ball, right in the block hole. The batsman does well to jam it out back down the pitch

another attempted slower ball, but this is a full toss that the batsman drags straight to midwicket! Could have gone anywhere really. But he is also struggling to complete the run here. Just makes it in time, the replays show
another boundary! Well done Khakurel, who gets to his half-century, with a sliced boundary through backward point. The floodgates have opened for Nepal.
length delivery that follows the batsman as he tries to make room, the batsman punches it to midwicket for a single
he makes room but gets cramped for room as the bowler chases him with a short of length delivery, he dabs it to point for a quick single
that was honing in on the middle stump, the batsman digs it out to off side for a single.
a very good slower delivery, completely messes with the batsman's mental computations. He swings across the line but makes no connection
good work at deep midwicket by Karim Sadiq, who dives full length to prevent a certain boundary. The batsman pulled it hard with enough timing, but he will have to settle with a couple
comes down the pitch and lofts this length delivery to long on for a single

that is the end of Khakurel's fantastic effort! He looks to heave the length delivery to the deep midwicket boundary but gets more height than length on that.. Ashgar Stanikzai does very well to run back from midwicket and grab that comfortably in the end
murdered down the ground! Wow, what a shot this one is! It was an attempted yorker gone wrong, but the batsman finds enough space to get under it hammer it over the umpire's head..

another one down! Shapoor got taken for runs off the fuller one, but his short delivery does the job. The batsman veers away to the leg side to smash it over the off, but gets a thick top edge that lobs up for the keeper
another one goes down! or does it! It is a quick short delivery that flies past the outside edge to the keeper, who goes up immediately. Shapoor joins in a little later but Aleem Dar is unmoved..
slower delivery on the pads, the batsman looks to heave it to the leg side, but misses it and gets hit on the pads
they will take whatever brings them some runs! the batsman looks to swing this length delivery across the line but gets a thick inside edge down to fine leg
he looks to paddle this one down the leg side but misses, the ball misses the leg stump too
wow! this one drops safely between midwicket and long on.. The batsman wanted to hit it out of the ground but got no timing in that
on the pads and he was ready for that, sweeps this one powerfully down the leg side for a boundary.. Fielder at deep backward square gets a bad bounce there
another cross-batted heave, but this one misses the bat and misses the off stick by a whisker
looks for that region behind square on the leg side again, but gets hit on the body
wonderful over! He bowls this slower than usual and the batsman, who was looking to heave this, misses completely. He gets hit on the body and they take a single
